transcript:
Tell me what it takes to get your feeling alive
Tell me how to show you it's a beautiful life
I'd do anything to pull you into the light
'Cause everything will change when you open your eyes

So don't you let the sunlight go by without you
Don't you realize how lucky we are?
Open up your heart babe and let it all go tonight

Live your life like you was running out of life
Live a life we got to screaming out
Breathe it in and feel the rush again
You're not lost no matter where you've been

You've been trying hard just to make it alone
Well I can help you baby let me carry the load
takeaways: Hãy sống một cuộc đời trọn vẹn và đam mê.
Mở lòng và đón nhận những điều tốt đẹp đến.
Bạn không hề đơn độc, luôn có người sẵn sàng giúp đỡ.
